name: Walmart
title: Software Engineer III
desc:
Enterprise Service Bus - A system that acts as an intermediate between the upstream and downstream systems. Produces and Consumes data through various mechanisms such as Kafka, Web Service, MQ and SFTP
        Designed and developed a component from scratch
        Mentored and lead a team of two
        Redesigned a component to handle the increase in incoming data volume during peak period
        Innovated a data parser that reduced the development time greatly from months to days
        
        Technologies Used: Java 8, Rest API, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Kafka, Active MQ, Azure Blob Storage, Azure SQL, Azure Cloud (WCNP), Git, MySQL
        
        .
